Public Member Functions

<CrystalPlayerDelegate> Protocol Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - crystalPlayerInfoUpdated
 Reports to the client that the CrystalPlayer info has been updated The updates can come as a result of a new gift being received or a change in the user logged into the system. This update message can still be received while the Crystal UI is still open, so it's important not to play any sounds or change the UI in response to the message.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) crystalPlayerInfoUpdated [optional]

Reports to the client that the CrystalPlayer info has been updated The updates can come as a result of a new gift being received or a change in the user logged into the system. This update message can still be received while the Crystal UI is still open, so it's important not to play any sounds or change the UI in response to the message.
